name: Trend - Corporate Site Minimal Design
description:
Trend is a multiline corporate website for any direction of your business. You can change the colors and content in it as you wish, everything is adjusted so that it would be convenient for you to work with the template.

The maximum number of adaptations, each page is adapted not only for mobile devices but also for high-resolution tablets.

We created the entire design according to the latest trends and marketing tricks. Fonts and pictures are used from free stocks.


Functions


20+ full layer Adobe Photoshop .PSD and Figma files

Designed with responsiveness in mind

Clean, modern design

Well organized layers make it very easy to update

All fonts used in templates are available in Google Font.


We hope you like it)
